entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Parent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness late this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 45 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
